attributes.action: Deem smart shorts acceptable as boys summer uniform in UK secondary schools.
attributes.additional_details: With summer temperatures continuing to increase in the UK, it should be acceptable for secondary age school boys to wear smart shorts as part of the summer uniform.
attributes.background: Allow smart shorts to be recognised as acceptable summer uniform for boys in UK secondary schools.

rejection.details:
Decisions about school uniforms at individual schools are a matter for the governing bodies for each school, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259

Prevent enforcement of school uniforms if temperatures exceed a certain level: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612028
